page.title: 11HOME LIFE
page.content: MY HOUSE BY ELIZABETH. I CAN SEE THE PARK ENTRANCE FROM MY HOUSE. I LIVE ON THE CORNER OF 'THE AVENUE'.I LIVE IN A VERY OLD STONE COTTAGE.ROUND THE BACK OF MY HOUSE ARE SOME COAL SHEDS,A LONG TIME AGO PEOPLE USED THEM TO KEEP ANIMALS IN.IN THE LOUNGE OF MY HOUSE I HAVE A COAL FIRE.IN THE DINING ROOM I HAVE ANOTHER COAL FIRE WITH AN OVEN AT THE SIDE WHERE YOU CAN COOK.I HAVE MY OWN BEDROOM,IT IS DECORATED IN PINK AND WHITE.I ALSO HAVE A PLAYROOM,IT IS DECORATED IN BLUE. IN THE GARDEN WE HAVE A VERY OLD HORSE CHESTNUT TREE WHICH CANNOT BE TAKEN DOWN.
